meaningMnemonic: Okay, so this one is really weird, sorry. Each of us only get <kanji>one</kanji> <kanji>body</kanji> in our lifetimes, right? Well what <vocabulary>the heck</vocabulary>! What if I want more than one body. Let's all be mad about this together.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just watch out because いち is shortened to いっ here!
